reviewText:
Deep and thoughtful.  Editing a bit helter skelter but worth it for the very fine information - a gift of thought.
Nice to see Ciel Bergman in this film - a great painter who just passed away.
A wonderful glimpse into Thomas Berry's life and teaching!
Father Berry had a real love of creation, from the simple to the complex.  His is a breathtaking love story.  You see things you never noticed before.
This is a fabulous short film on the life and legacy of one of the great environmentalist of our time: Thomas Berry.
Very thoughtprovoking and inspiring, essential viewing! We borrowed this dvd for a group meeting and most viewers loved it so I went ahead and bought my own copy to lend to others.

This is one of the best video options to better understand Father Thomas Berry's ideals and impact on our 'natural world.'  This was done in 2002 after he had retired to his home place of North Carolina.  Those interviewed have excellent comments to relay about his ability to conceptualize some of the world religions and interpret their philosophies for modern man.  The Earth, our Mother, stays at the forefront.
